description: Identify the decile with the highest total income.
Determine the total income for the 7th decile.
Calculate the difference in total income between the top decile and the 6th decile.
Identify any decile that has a significantly lower total income compared to others.
Find out if there is a correlation between the decile ranking and the total income.

Rank the deciles from highest to lowest based on their total income.
Determine the range of total income values across all deciles.
What percentage of deciles have a total income below 20,000 GBP?
Identify any clusters of deciles with similar total income values.
